verses.verse: I say<WG3004> the truth<WG225> in<WG1722> Christ,<WG5547> I lie<WG5574> not,<WG3756> my<WG3450> conscience<WG4893> also bearing me witness<WG4828> <WG3427> in<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151>
That <WG3754> I<WG3427> have<WG2076> great<WG3173> heaviness<WG3077> and<WG2532> continual<WG88> sorrow<WG3601> in my<WG3450> heart.<WG2588>

For <WG1063> I<WG1473> could wish<WG2172> that myself<WG848> were<WG1511> accursed<WG331> from<WG575> Christ<WG5547> for<WG5228> my<WG3450> brethren,<WG80> my<WG3450> kinsmen<WG4773> according<WG2596> to the flesh: <WG4561>

Who <WG3748> are<WG1526> Israelites;<WG2475> to whom<WG3739> pertaineth the<WG3588> adoption,<WG5206> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> covenants,<WG1242> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> giving of the law,<WG3548> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> service<WG2999> of God, and<WG2532> the<WG3588> promises;<WG1860>

Whose <WG3739> are the<WG3588> fathers,<WG3962> and<WG2532> of<WG1537> whom<WG3739> as concerning<WG2596> the flesh<WG4561> Christ<WG5547> came, who is<WG5607> over<WG1909> all,<WG3956> God<WG2316> blessed<WG2128> forever.<WG1519> <WG165> Amen.<WG281>

<WG1161> Not<WG3756> as though<WG3754> <WG3634> the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> hath taken none effect.<WG1601> For<WG1063> they<WG3778> are not<WG3756> all<WG3956> Israel,<WG2474> which<WG3588> are of<WG1537> Israel: <WG2474>

Neither, <WG3761> because<WG3754> they are<WG1526> the seed<WG4690> of Abraham,<WG11> are they all<WG3956> children:<WG5043> but,<WG235> In<WG1722> Isaac<WG2464> shall thy<WG4671> seed<WG4690> be called.<WG2564>

That is,<WG5123> They which are the<WG3588> children<WG5043> of the<WG3588> flesh,<WG4561> these<WG5023> are not<WG3756> the children<WG5043> of God:<WG2316> but<WG235> the<WG3588> children<WG5043> of the<WG3588> promise<WG1860> are counted<WG3049> for<WG1519> the seed.<WG4690>
For <WG1063> this<WG3778> is the<WG3588> word<WG3056> of promise,<WG1860> At<WG2596> this<WG5126> time<WG2540> will I come,<WG2064> and<WG2532> Sarah<WG4564> shall have<WG2071> a son.<WG5207>
And <WG1161> not<WG3756> only<WG3440> this; but<WG235> when Rebecca<WG4479> also<WG2532> had<WG2192> conceived<WG2845> by<WG1537> one,<WG1520> even by our<WG2257> father<WG3962> Isaac;<WG2464>

(For <WG1063> the children being not yet<WG3380> born,<WG1080> neither<WG3366> having done<WG4238> any<WG5100> good<WG18> or<WG2228> evil,<WG2556> that<WG2443> the<WG3588> purpose<WG4286> of God<WG2316> according<WG2596> to election<WG1589> might stand,<WG3306> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> works,<WG2041> but<WG235> of<WG1537> him that calleth;)<WG2564>
It was said<WG4483> unto her,<WG846> The<WG3588> elder<WG3187> shall serve<WG1398> the<WG3588> younger.<WG1640>
As <WG2531> it is written,<WG1125> Jacob<WG2384> have I loved,<WG25> but<WG1161> Esau<WG2269> have I hated.<WG3404>
What <WG5101> shall we say<WG2046> then?<WG3767> Is there<WG3361> unrighteousness<WG93> with<WG3844> God?<WG2316> God forbid.<WG1096> <WG3361>

For <WG1063> he saith<WG3004> to Moses,<WG3475> I will have mercy<WG1653> on whom<WG3739> <WG302> I will have mercy,<WG1653> and<WG2532> I will have compassion<WG3627> on whom<WG3739> <WG302> I will have compassion.<WG3627>
So <WG686> then<WG3767> it is not<WG3756> of him that willeth,<WG2309> nor<WG3761> of him that runneth,<WG5143> but<WG235> of God<WG2316> that showeth mercy.<WG1653>

For <WG1063> the<WG3588> Scripture<WG1124> saith<WG3004> unto Pharaoh,<WG5328> Even for<WG1519> this same purpose<WG5124> <WG846> have I raised thee up,<WG1825> <WG4571> that<WG3704> I might show<WG1731> my<WG3450> power<WG1411> in<WG1722> thee,<WG4671> and<WG2532> that<WG3704> my<WG3450> name<WG3686> might be declared<WG1229> throughout<WG1722> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>
Therefore <WG686> <WG3767> hath he mercy<WG1653> on whom<WG3739> he will<WG2309> have mercy, and<WG1161> whom<WG3739> he will<WG2309> he hardeneth.<WG4645>
Thou wilt say<WG2046> then<WG3767> unto me,<WG3427> Why<WG5101> doth he yet<WG2089> find fault?<WG3201> For<WG1063> who<WG5101> hath resisted<WG436> his<WG846> will?<WG1013>

Nay but,<WG3304> O<WG5599> man,<WG444> who<WG5101> art<WG1488> thou<WG4771> that repliest against<WG470> God?<WG2316> Shall<WG3361> the<WG3588> thing formed<WG4110> say<WG2046> to him that formed<WG4111> it, Why<WG5101> hast thou made<WG4160> me<WG3165> thus?<WG3779>

<WG2228> Hath<WG2192> not<WG3756> the<WG3588> potter<WG2763> power<WG1849> over the<WG3588> clay,<WG4081> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> same<WG846> lump<WG5445> to make<WG4160> one<WG3739> <WG3303> vessel<WG4632> unto<WG1519> honor,<WG5092> and<WG1161> another<WG3739> unto<WG1519> dishonor?<WG819>

What <WG1161> if<WG1487> God,<WG2316> willing<WG2309> to show<WG1731> his wrath,<WG3709> and<WG2532> to make his power known,<WG1107> <WG848> <WG1415> endured<WG5342> with<WG1722> much<WG4183> longsuffering<WG3115> the vessels<WG4632> of wrath<WG3709> fitted<WG2675> to<WG1519> destruction: <WG684>

And <WG2532> that<WG2443> he might make known<WG1107> the<WG3588> riches<WG4149> of his<WG848> glory<WG1391> on<WG1909> the vessels<WG4632> of mercy,<WG1656> which<WG3739> he had afore prepared<WG4282> unto<WG1519> glory,<WG1391>
Even <WG2532> us,<WG2248> whom<WG3739> he hath called,<WG2564> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> the Jews<WG2453> only,<WG3440> but<WG235> also<WG2532> of<WG1537> the Gentiles?<WG1484>

As <WG5613> he saith<WG3004> also<WG2532> in<WG1722> Hosea,<WG5617> I will call<WG2564> them my<WG3450> people,<WG2992> which<WG3588> were not<WG3756> my<WG3450> people;<WG2992> and<WG2532> her beloved,<WG25> which was not beloved.<WG25> <WG3756>

And <WG2532> it shall come to pass,<WG2071> that in<WG1722> the<WG3588> place<WG5117> where<WG3757> it was said<WG4483> unto them,<WG846> Ye<WG5210> are not<WG3756> my<WG3450> people;<WG2992> there<WG1563> shall they be called<WG2564> the children<WG5207> of the living<WG2198> God.<WG2316>

Isaiah <WG2268> also<WG1161> crieth<WG2896> concerning<WG5228> Israel,<WG2474> Though<WG1437> the<WG3588> number<WG706> of the<WG3588> children<WG5207> of Israel<WG2474> be<WG5600> as<WG5613> the<WG3588> sand<WG285> of the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> a remnant<WG2640> shall be saved: <WG4982>

For <WG1063> he will finish<WG4931> the work,<WG3056> and<WG2532> cut it short<WG4932> in<WG1722> righteousness:<WG1343> because<WG3754> a short<WG4932> work<WG3056> will the Lord<WG2962> make<WG4160> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>

And <WG2532> as<WG2531> Isaiah<WG2268> said before,<WG4280> Except<WG1508> the Lord<WG2962> of Sabaoth<WG4519> had left<WG1459> us<WG2254> a seed,<WG4690> we had been<WG1096> <WG302> as<WG5613> Sodom,<WG4670> and<WG2532> been made like<WG3666> <WG302> unto<WG5613> Gomorrah.<WG1116>

What <WG5101> shall we say<WG2046> then?<WG3767> That<WG3754> the Gentiles,<WG1484> which<WG3588> followed<WG1377> not<WG3361> after righteousness,<WG1343> have attained<WG2638> to righteousness,<WG1343> even<WG1161> the righteousness<WG1343> which<WG3588> is of<WG1537> faith.<WG4102>
But <WG1161> Israel,<WG2474> which followed<WG1377> after the law<WG3551> of righteousness,<WG1343> hath not<WG3756> attained<WG5348> to<WG1519> the law<WG3551> of righteousness.<WG1343>

Wherefore? <WG1302> Because<WG3754> they sought it not<WG3756> by<WG1537> faith,<WG4102> but<WG235> as it were<WG5613> by<WG1537> the works<WG2041> of the law.<WG3551> For<WG1063> they stumbled<WG4350> at that stumblingstone;<WG4348> <WG3037>

As <WG2531> it is written,<WG1125> Behold,<WG2400> I lay<WG5087> in<WG1722> Zion<WG4622> a stumblingstone<WG4348> <WG3037> and<WG2532> rock<WG4073> of offense:<WG4625> and<WG2532> whosoever<WG3956> believeth<WG4100> on<WG1909> him<WG846> shall not<WG3756> be ashamed.<WG2617>
